## jx gitops plugin get

Display the binary plugins

***Aliases**: list,ls*

### Usage

```
jx gitops plugin get
```

### Synopsis

Display the binary plugins

### Examples

  ```bash
  # list all binary plugins
  jx plugin get

  ```
